info.title: One Stop Backend
info.description: One Stop Backend is a platform to view, manage mobile plans and broadband plans for customers, online recharge, view and manage broadband bills, make broadband payments, track mobile and broadband data usage, and shop for products like mobile broadband tech devices and tech accessories
